guidelines: Use the Inertia <Form> component for building forms in React.
Use shadcn Field components (FieldSet, FieldLegend, FieldGroup, Field, FieldLabel, FieldDescription, FieldError) from '@/components/ui/field' for form fields.
Use TypeScript definitions from '@/wayfinder/types' (e.g., App.Models.BusinessPlan) for Eloquent models in the frontend.
